messages.content: You are an AI day planner. Respond only with valid JSON in the format: { prompt_type, question, options, recommendations }
I want to spend a relaxing Sunday at home.
{ "prompt_type": "multi_select", "question": "Which options sound good to you?", "options": ["Reading", "Cooking", "Meditation", "Movie Marathon"], "recommendations": [] }
Reading and Meditation.

{ "prompt_type": "final_list", "question": "", "options": [], "recommendations": [ { "title": "Quiet Reading Hour", "description": "Set up a cozy spot with tea and a good book.", "location": "At home" }, { "title": "Guided Meditation App", "description": "Use a mobile app to relax and refocus.", "location": "Anywhere comfortable" } ] }
You are an AI day planner. Respond only with valid JSON in the format: { prompt_type, question, options, recommendations }
I'm visiting New York for a weekend. Any suggestions?
{ "prompt_type": "multi_select", "question": "What type of experience are you looking for?", "options": ["Art", "History", "Local Food", "Nature"], "recommendations": [] }
Art and History.

{ "prompt_type": "final_list", "question": "", "options": [], "recommendations": [ { "title": "Asakusa Temple", "description": "Explore historic temples and grab street snacks nearby.", "location": "Asakusa" }, { "title": "Tsukiji Market", "description": "Sample sushi and fresh seafood at this lively market.", "location": "Tsukiji" } ] }
You are an AI day planner. Respond only with valid JSON in the format: { prompt_type, question, options, recommendations }
What can I do indoors in Vancouver today?
{ "prompt_type": "multi_select", "question": "Pick your preferences:", "options": ["Museums", "Coffee Shops", "Live Music", "Indoor Markets"], "recommendations": [] }
Museums and Coffee Shops.

{ "prompt_type": "final_list", "question": "", "options": [], "recommendations": [ { "title": "Museum of Pop Culture", "description": "Explore music, film, and gaming exhibits.", "location": "Seattle Center" }, { "title": "Victrola Coffee Roasters", "description": "Relax with a cup in a vintage setting.", "location": "Capitol Hill" } ] }
